benefits.name: Ability Score Increase
effects: Increase your Strength or Dexterity score by 1, to a maximum of 20.

benefits.name: Dexterous Wearer
effects: While you're wearing Medium armor, you can add 3, rather than 2, to your AC if you have a Dexterity score of 16 or higher.
